title: Add unit tests for Model and rendering
description:
Create internal/tui/model_test.go with tests:

Model tests:
- TestNew: verify initial state from Config
- TestUpdate_WindowResize: verify dimension calculations
- TestUpdate_KeyQuit: verify quitting state
- TestUpdate_KeyPause: verify pause toggle and channel send
- TestUpdate_KeyNavigation: verify j/k movement in each pane
- TestUpdate_PaneFocus: verify tab cycling

Message tests:
- TestUpdate_IterationStart: verify state updates
- TestUpdate_IterationEnd: verify cost/token updates
- TestUpdate_OutputMsg: verify output appending
- TestUpdate_TasksUpdate: verify task list updates
- TestUpdate_RunComplete: verify completion state

Render tests:
- TestRenderStatusBar: verify formatting
- TestRenderTaskPane: verify task formatting
- TestRenderFooter: verify hint formatting

Helper tests:
- TestFormatDuration: verify time formatting
- TestTaskStatusIcon: verify icon selection
- TestPulsingStyle: verify color cycling

Use testing.T and assert on string contains for render tests.
closed_reason: Added comprehensive unit tests in internal/tui/model_test.go covering: Model initialization (TestNew, TestInit), Update handlers (WindowResize, KeyQuit, KeyPause, KeyNavigation, PaneFocus), Messages (IterationStart/End, Output, Tasks, RunComplete, Signal, Error, Tick), Rendering (StatusBar, TaskPane, Footer), Helpers (formatDuration, StatusIcon, pulsingStyle, IsBlocked, RenderTask, focus helpers), View modes (Loading, Normal, Help/Complete overlays), and Picker (New, Selected, Navigation, Enter, Quit, View). 45 tests total, all passing.
